email_body: Do you have a distribution list to send this to all the traders. Phillip ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 04/04/2001 07:11 AM --------------------------- To: Fred Lagrasta/HOU/ECT@ECT, Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT, Scott Neal/HOU/ECT@ECT, James W Lewis/HOU/EES@EES cc: Subject: EES Gas Desk Happy Hour Fred/Phillip/Scott: We are having a happy hour at Sambuca this Thursday, please be our guests and invite anyone on your desks that would be interested in meeting some of the new gas desk team. Thank you, Jess
